resources.string: Permission to block screen not granted. Exiting.
This app allows you to limit the time and frequency of use of your mobile device, blocking it completely.
Set the following parameters and protect your time and your mind. Don\'t become a subject of performance.
The app uses a time bucket to know when to block the device. The bucket has the size of your "max continuous time" (%s).
When you use your device, the bucket drains, and when it is not used, it fills. The drain and fill rates are determined by your target time (%s).
With the current settings, the fill rate is about %d times slower than the drain rate, so for every %d minutes that the device is off, you will get 1 minute of use time.
When the bucket is empty, the device is blocked until the bucket is filled back to half its capacity. With the current settings, that would be %d minutes.
Also, to discourage compulsive use, just unlocking the device counts as 1 minute of use.
